title: Women representation in law firms
summary: The charts show the Women representation in various firms .
Insurance has the highest representtation at 65 percentage whereas Law_Firms has the lowest at 35 percentage - a 30 percentage difference .
Financial_Groups appear to have the most equal representation with 50 percentage .
gold: The chart compares the percentage of female representation across different sectors . Whilst insurance and tech sectors are leading the charge at over 60 % , law firms are farther behind around 35 % .
